job description: Job DescriptionVALiNTRY is seeking a Big Data Engineer in Winter Springs, FL.Summary of role:Provide hands-on technical thought-leadership in Big data architecture and problem-solving to support a fast-growing Software Services Division.Our leadership team values our associate's ideas, teamwork, and self-motivation and encourages out-of-the-box thinking to develop creative solutions to tough problems.Proven Technical Skillset and Professional Experience:Experience in Hadoop eco-system with HDFS, HBase,Oozie, Scoop, Pig, Hive, Flume, Spark, Kafka, Solr, Zookeeper, Hue, RabbitMQ, Java, Python, Scala, and other ETL tools; NoSQL like MongoDBScripting experience in one or more of the following: PowerShell, Perl, shell, VB scripting, Batch etc...Knowledge and experience with one or more of DevOps tools such as Kubernetes, Jenkins, Bamboo, Ant, Maven, GitHub, Docker and PuppetDeveloping prototypes/POC, code structure, coding and testingExcellent communication, presentation, documentation, influencing and reasoning skills.For immediate response please forward resumes to dmartinek@valintry.com Very Best,Dan Martinek IT Recruiting Manager(Direct) 407-205-1127(Cell) 407-616-4619(Office) 800-360-1407www.VALiNTRY.com1201 S. Orlando Ave. #440Winter Park, FL 32789For a list of our current openings please visit Valintry's Jobs Webpage Please note: This client is not accepting candidates submitted by other staffing firms or agencies at this time. Thank you.
